about_the_game:
Children's of Mare, seamlessly blends the colony management and roguelite genres into a unique experience. Players command nightmares under the orders of Mare, the goddess of nightmares, with the aim of invading and consuming the host, where players build, expand, and corrupt colonies in a dreamlike world. They explore diverse biomes, gather resources, complete missions, and face unique challenges in each playthrough.

Mother doesn’t stop creating and needs a little more from us.


All for Mare: You've invaded a mind, infiltrating with Mare’s nightmares.

Build and expand your influence in the subconscious by constructing critical facilities that solidify control and corrupt the host. Start with Mare and develop essential structures, including Storage for efficient management, Cloning for creating minions, and Refineries to upgrade basic materials into advanced components.

Gather resources, execute Mare’s orders, and consume the host in this relentless strategy. Face the darkness and seize mental domination.

How will you design your network of power to maximize effectiveness and secure control? Are you ready to conquer every corner of the subconscious and impose Mare’s will?


Each mind is unique, presenting challenges you've never faced, and dangers that could bring you to your end. But all hope is not lost. You have the power to perform rituals that can bend the course of the game to your will. Discover buildings that have never been seen before, reshape your minions to make them faster, stronger or even allow them teleport.

This is only the beginning.


Hidden deep within the brain of your victim, hunt the ruins of The seven deadly sins and a host of other evil, which will lay waste to everything you've built to the ground.
Conquer them, hold them, do whatever you can to not let them alter your colony and destroy it.
Once you tame the ruins, use them to take advantage of them and end your victim to feed Mare.

So be careful!, be Fast! and don't let the ruins get over you.


Have you already conquered the host's mind? Great, but it doesn't end there. Mare is always thirsty for fear, so she will reward you with new unlocks to encourage you to consume more minds where you can start from scratch, choose different rituals, and explore more.

content_descriptors.notes: Explicit mentions of mental disorders and folklore horror.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700F @ 3.00GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Venture into the host's mind and extracts all its fears to feed Mare. Build, explore, mine and conquer ruins to please the goddess of nightmares.

English*, Spanish - Spain*
